title: Interstate transfer fee
context: ยง353B-6 Interstate transfer fee. The judiciary may assess a fee not to exceed $200 for each application made by a parolee or probationer for a transfer out of the State; provided that the fees collected shall be deposited into the probation services special fund established in section 706-649. [L 2008, c 172, ยง1; am L 2012, c 303, ยง1]
